last_episode_to_air.name: New Year's
last_episode_to_air.overview: From building a champagne tower with a world-renowned champagne glass engineer to discussing clocks with the local clocks man, Amy demonstrates how to prepare for the big countdown.

name: At Home with Amy Sedaris
overview: Comedian Amy Sedaris cordially invites you into her home, where she will show off diverse but necessary homemaking skills, from death-bed etiquette, to gutting a fish, to crocheting miniature sweaters for a mice infestation, to entertaining your husband's business associates. As always, Amy will give it her best shot to entertain guests, increase her know-how and her can-do, and attempt to work out personal issues.

episodes.name: TGIF
episodes.overview: With help from her friends, Amy prepares a fish dinner for a group of businessmen; a lesson on lamb chops and a run-in with infectious earrings.

episodes.name: Cooking for One
episodes.overview: From solo meal preparation to tantalizing techniques for self-pampering, Amy demonstrates the independent bliss of the single lady lifestyle - until Amy's first guest, Greek chef Panos Sakkus, seduces her with his European charm.

episodes.name: Gift Giving
episodes.overview: Amy gives detailed instructions on: gluing things to popsicle sticks, working with pipe cleaners and surviving the craft room, the most dangerous room in the house. Plus, Amy presents her turtle sitter with a bevy of handmade gifts.

episodes.name: Entertaining for Peanuts
episodes.overview: Amy's rich uncle is coming to visit, so Amy enlists the help of a hobo with a foot fetish and a neighbor with a platter fetish to prove that all it takes to appear rich is a little creativity.

episodes.name: Grieving
episodes.overview: Amy dedicates this show to entertaining gloomy guests who need a pick-me-up. Plus, Amy discovers the loss of a beloved pet and sinks into her own dark place. But Patty Hogg takes charge of the show and steers it into unchartered territory.

episodes.name: Nature
episodes.overview: After performing her morning routine of outdoor Tai Chi in the nude, Amy gets locked out of her house. But she forages in the woods to put together a magical dinner. Plus, a chance bite by a venomous snake proves to be quite charming.

episodes.name: Holidays
episodes.overview: When a mishap prevents Amy from continuing her celebrity-packed holiday spectacular, some otherworldly visitors help her recapture her holiday spirit.

episodes.name: Out of This World
episodes.overview: What does it mean to push the boundaries of hospitality? To transport our appetites beyond the limits of reason? To take the seven-course meal into the fourth dimension? Find out tonight, when Amy takes you... Out of This World.

episodes.name: Making Love
episodes.overview: Amy dedicates her entire show to the difficult craft of love-making. She learns about natural musk, offers viewers advice and shares tales of romance courtesy of Patty Hogg. Plus, Amy takes us through the craft step by step.

episodes.name: Murdercide
episodes.overview: It was an award-winning show night like any other; Amy was having the book club over for paella when during a rainstorm, a curious stranger arrived on her doorstep. Then, a corpse was discovered. Was it murder? It was!

episodes.name: Teenagers
episodes.overview: Amy grapples with irrational fear, utter confusion, and emotional fragility, and then she meets a teenager. Yup, you will meet an actual teenager, and Amy will learn a little something along the way.

episodes.name: Creativity
episodes.overview: After Amy finds it impossible to create a hat from craft room odds and ends, she is formally diagnosed with crafter's block. Watch Amy battle back from the brink of madness to find the courage to return to her felt scraps and fabric glue.

episodes.name: All About Amy
episodes.overview: Amy invites the winner of the "Biggest Fan Essay Contest" to co-host. But as she shares her kitchen and craft room with contest winner Mary from Two Points, it becomes clear that Mary has her eyes on something much more than co-hosting.

episodes.name: Makeover
episodes.overview: In her closet, Amy discovers the ghost of a dead sea captain with a keen eye for home d√©cor. But as the two bond over curtains, they wind up falling in love. Will Amy chose the dead over the living? Tune in to find out!

episodes.name: Anniversary
episodes.overview: Amy celebrates the show's 15th episode anniversary with big celebrity guests, local singers, balloons, and a look back at some of the show's most memorable moments that nobody remembers.

episodes.name: Halloween
episodes.overview: Amy finds out her set has a gory past and might be haunted after talking to the Research Triangle's town historian about Halloween lore. Unnerved, Amy moves forward with her show, only to encounter a strange and horrific sequence of events!

episodes.name: Hospital-tality
episodes.overview: While Amy demonstrates how to take care of an illard, Chassie uses the opportunity to fake an affliction until her family shows up looking for a chunk of her hard-earned TV star cash. Later, when Chassie's landlord shows up, she and Amy will have to wait until dark to escape with their lives.

episodes.name: Thanksgiving
episodes.overview: Amy hosts a traditional Thanksgiving dinner, but as she and her guests sit down, a flock of unhappy turkeys seeks revenge for the fate of their roasted brethren. Trapped, Amy and her friends must discover the true meaning of Thanksgiving.

episodes.name: Confectionaries
episodes.overview: Amy has a special sponsor, Confederated Sugar Industries, which sends over its Confederated Sugar mascot, Sugar Griz. The two happily demonstrate how to make sweet things until Sugar Griz becomes, not so sweet.

episodes.name: Game Night
episodes.overview: Amy invites some friends over, including a special guest, for an evening of adult play and finger foods! But when a freak storm slams into the Research Triangle area, Amy's game of fun and frivolity turns into a game of life and death!

episodes.name: Babies
episodes.overview: Amy explains something no one understands: babies! Learn how to pick the perfect baby name, how to get your perfect body back, and how to design the perfect crib mobile from rusty nails!

episodes.name: Valentine's Day
episodes.overview: Amy hosts her first Valentine's Day mixer! After resigning herself to a special relationship with the middle-aged lady in the mirror, Amy thinks she has finally found true love The mismatched pair navigates speed bumps, hurdles and angry friends.

episodes.name: Outdoor Entertaining
episodes.overview: Amy hosts a Labor Day BBQ in Patty Hogg's backyard. The celebration kicks off when the At Home Charter bus arrives carrying the Sedaris crew, but the festivities take a turn when a mysterious but tantalizing drifter staggers into the yard.

episodes.name: Easter
episodes.overview: Amy gives a glimpse into all her Easter traditions, her biannual egg hunt and her delicious Easter brunch.

episodes.name: Travel
episodes.overview: Amy Sedaris applies her distinctive brand of silliness to a mash-up of hospitality, variety and talk show formats showcasing her diverse homemaking skills.

episodes.name: First Dates
episodes.overview: Amy shows us how to prepare for a first date, by preparing for a first date. Soon she will meet in person the man she's been corresponding with through a letter-writing romance.

episodes.name: Dips and Dunkers
episodes.overview: Amy hosts a party to watch the big game! Amy is not usually thought of as a sporting fan, but she's willing to play along if it means attracting a younger TV watching demographic.

episodes.name: Signature Dishes
episodes.overview: In this very special episode of At Home with Amy Sedaris, Amy prepares her famous Ginger Snap recipe to be sanctioned by the Culinary Academy as her very own signature dish!

episodes.name: Inspiration
episodes.overview: In this very special episode of At Home with Amy Sedaris, Amy explores inspiration, the place where ideas come from, with a local children's author, a local theater director and a local lady who lives in the woods.

episodes.name: New Year's
episodes.overview: From building a champagne tower with a world-renowned champagne glass engineer to discussing clocks with the local clocks man, Amy demonstrates how to prepare for the big countdown.
